description: Master CPA REG covering Federal Taxation, Business Law, and Ethics

slides.title: Welcome to CPA REG
slides.content:
# Regulation (REG)

REG covers **taxation** and **business law**.

## What You Will Learn

- **Individual Tax** - Federal income
- **Entity Tax** - C, S, partnership
- **Property** - Basis and disposition
- **Business Law** - Legal framework

## Exam Areas

| Area | Weight |
|------|--------|
| Ethics | 10-20% |
| Business law | 10-20% |
| Federal taxation | 60-75% |

slides.title: Individual Taxation
slides.content:
# Tax Computation

## Formula

```
Gross Income
- Adjustments (Above the line)
= AGI
- Standard or Itemized
= Taxable Income
x Tax Rate
= Tax Liability
- Credits
= Tax Due/Refund
```

## Filing Status

| Status | Impact |
|--------|--------|
| Single | Standard |
| MFJ | Highest deduction |
| MFS | Lowest deduction |
| HOH | Middle |

slides.title: Gross Income
slides.content:
# Inclusions and Exclusions

## Included

| Item | Treatment |
|------|----------|
| Wages | Fully taxable |
| Interest | Taxable |
| Dividends | Taxable |
| Business income | Schedule C |
| Capital gains | Schedule D |

## Excluded

| Item | Exclusion |
|------|----------|
| Gifts | Excluded |
| Inheritance | Excluded |
| Municipal bonds | Tax-free |
| Life insurance | Excluded |

slides.title: Deductions
slides.content:
# Above and Below the Line

## Above the Line (Adjustments)

| Deduction | Limit |
|-----------|-------|
| IRA | $6,500 (2023) |
| Student loan interest | $2,500 |
| Self-employment tax | 50% |
| HSA | Contribution limit |

## Itemized (Below the Line)

| Deduction | Limit |
|-----------|-------|
| SALT | $10,000 |
| Mortgage interest | $750K |
| Charity | 60%/30% AGI |
| Medical | > 7.5% AGI |

slides.title: Capital Gains
slides.content:
# Property Transactions

## Holding Period

| Period | Rate |
|--------|------|
| Short-term (< 1 year) | Ordinary |
| Long-term (> 1 year) | 0/15/20% |

## Gain Calculation

```
Amount Realized
- Adjusted Basis
= Gain or Loss
```

## Special Provisions

| Provision | Benefit |
|-----------|--------|
| Sec 121 | Home sale exclusion |
| Sec 1031 | Like-kind exchange |
| Sec 1244 | Ordinary loss on stock |

slides.title: Basis
slides.content:
# Property Basis

## Acquired Basis

| Method | Basis |
|--------|-------|
| Purchase | Cost |
| Gift | Carryover |
| Inheritance | FMV at death |
| Like-kind | Carryover |

## Adjustments

```
Original Basis
+ Improvements
- Depreciation
= Adjusted Basis
```

## Depreciation

- MACRS for tax
- Bonus (100%)
- Section 179

slides.title: C Corporations
slides.content:
# Corporate Taxation

## Tax Rate

```
Flat 21% (TCJA)
```

## Special Issues

| Issue | Treatment |
|-------|----------|
| DRD | Dividends received deduction |
| NOL | Carryforward unlimited |
| AMT | Repealed for corps |

## Formation

```
Sec 351: Tax-free if
- Property for stock
- 80% control
```

slides.title: S Corporations
slides.content:
# Pass-Through Entity

## Requirements

| Requirement | Limit |
|-------------|-------|
| Shareholders | 100 max |
| Class of stock | One only |
| Eligible shareholders | US individuals |

## Taxation

```
Income flows to shareholders
K-1 reporting
Basis adjustments
```

## Built-In Gains

- C corp conversion
- 5-year period
- Corporate-level tax

slides.title: Partnerships
slides.content:
# Partnership Taxation

## Characteristics

| Feature | Treatment |
|---------|----------|
| Entity | Pass-through |
| Formation | Generally tax-free |
| Distributions | Basis reduction |

## Special Allocations

- Must have economic effect
- Substantial economic effect test

## Basis

```
Contribution basis
+ Share of income
+ Share of liabilities
- Distributions
- Share of losses
= Partner basis
```

slides.title: Business Law - Contracts
slides.content:
# Contract Law

## Elements

| Element | Requirement |
|---------|-------------|
| Offer | Definite terms |
| Acceptance | Mirror image |
| Consideration | Value exchange |
| Capacity | Legal ability |

## Defenses

| Defense | Effect |
|---------|--------|
| Fraud | Voidable |
| Duress | Voidable |
| Statute of Frauds | Unenforceable |

slides.content:

| Authority | Source |

| Security | Type |

slides.content:

- Enrolled agents
